content: there s nothing more adorable than kids in their holiday best including this fun crochet vest stitched in red heart super saver bitty stripes let the yarn do the colorwork as you work in alternating single_crochet and double_crochet stitches to create your fabric practice simple shaping v-neck side-to-side ribbing in the back loop and more this textured vest is made in 2 pieces and seamed together with an optional gnome appliqué for a fun finishing touch available in kids sizes 2-10 you can make one for all the little gnomes on your list materials red heart® super saver® bitty stripes™ 10 oz/283 g 515 yds/471 m sizes 2 4 6 8 10 yrs main color mc festive 0126 1 1 1 1 2 ball appliqué only red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 365 yds/333 m contrast a soft white 0316 1 ball or 11 yds/10 m contrast b jade 3862 1 ball or 6 yds/5 5 m contrast c shocking pink 0718 1 ball or 6 yds/5 5 m contrast d cherry red 0319 1 ball or 1 5 yds/1 5 m gauges 13 sts and 12 row = 4 10 cm with smaller hook 12 sts and 11 row = 4 10 cm with larger hook in pat vest to fit chest measurement 2 21 53 5 cm 4 23 58 5 cm 6 25 63 5 cm 8 26½ 67 5 cm 10 28 71 cm
